title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Course on Enhancing Anatomical Visualization Skills Using 2D Diagrams

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can infer 3D spatial relationships from 2D anatomical diagrams with 80% accuracy.
Students can explain three or more diagram interpretation strategies applying Cognitive Load Theory.
Learners achieve 85+ points on a 5-item assessment identifying major organ locations using visual materials in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
